cause.description:
This site is established in loving memory of all animals that have suffered by the hands of men. Show your support by making friends aware of the danger our pet friends are in out there.
Share pictures and stories if you have suffered a los, because of cruelty.
-Established by Lourens Kleynhans, Wicus Viljoen and Chanelle Norris-
In loving memory of Charlie and Noenoe
1. Animal cruelty must end now
cause.mission: Make people around you aware that animals need love and care.
cause.name: Pets are people too.
